casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Charles Anthony BALL. No. 102P13-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Charles Anthony Ball, Spruce Pine, for Ball, Charles Anthony. Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of May 2015 by Defendant to Suppress:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
